description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. T. Piyasoma, Mr. K. R. M. N. Lawrence and Mr. Upali Samaraweera as the Arbitrators to the Industrial Disputes - Mr. H. A. Cyril and SLTB - Mr. P. G. R. Piyaratne and SLTB - between 111 employees including Mr. Samitha Dissanayaka and the National Filk Corporation of Sri Lanka respectively
